paragraphs.title: Write To HDFS
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
# This will write to HDFS in a partitioned glob. 
# You can import it using pyspark without combining the glob.
# You can fetch the merged glob by using `hdfs dfs -getmerge`:
# https://hadoop.apache.org/docs/r2.7.3/hadoop-project-dist/hadoop-common/FileSystemShell.html#getmerge
cleanedDF.write.json('/share_dir/attack_westminster_small_cleaned.json')
